snippet: Building permits surged 11.8 percent to a seasonally adjusted annual pace of 1.28 million units, the highest since August 2007, the Commerce Department said.
lead_paragraph: Building permits surged 11.8 percent to a seasonally adjusted annual pace of 1.28 million units, the highest since August 2007, the Commerce Department said.

headline.main: Home Construction Permits Soared in May; Housing Industry Fortunes Improving
